attendClassesOnIos: Access your live online classes from your Internet-enabled iOS mobile device – no matter when or where. Experience the world’s best virtual classroom - now! on your phone.
everythingNeededToCondutClasses: Everything you need to conduct and attend live online classes – anytime, anywhere – with the world’s 1st and best mobile learning app.
getContentOnMobile: Get course content including PowerPoint slides, documents, presentations, videos, and more – right on your mobile device. Access learning materials instantly, whenever you need them.
interactionWithFellows: Interact with fellow students and teacher during online discussions and emails from within WizIQ’s mobile app, and get the guidance and answers you need to improve your performance.
